Leveraging Strike.name: Leveraging Strike
Leveraging Strike.flavor: You use your weapon to move your target where you want.
Leveraging Strike.requirement: You must be wielding a two-handed reach weapon.
Leveraging Strike.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you slide the target a number of squares equal to your Wisdom modifier.
